jollyRoger: A skull with a white upward-curved mustache and a cross behind it

keyMoments.title: Death of Captain Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: The Whitebeard Pirates witness the death of their captain and father figure, Edward Newgate, marking the end of an era.
keyMoments.significance: The death of their captain leads to the eventual dissolution of the crew and a major shift in world power.

keyMoments.title: The Crew Mourns Their Captain
keyMoments.description: The Whitebeard Pirates break down in collective grief as they witness their captain die standing.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the deep familial bonds within the crew.

enemies.reason: Blackbeard betrayed the Whitebeard Pirates and killed their captain

notes: After Whitebeard's death, the crew eventually disbanded. Marco attempted to keep them together, but they were defeated by the Blackbeard Pirates in the Payback War.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Pirates vs Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: The Blackbeard Pirates confront Whitebeard in a climactic battle at Marineford.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's cowardly assault on the dying Whitebeard establishes their ruthless nature.

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Pirates' Brutal Assault
keyMoments.description: The entire Blackbeard Pirates crew swarms Whitebeard with guns and blades in a dishonorable group attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's willingness to use any means necessary to achieve their goals.

enemies.reason: Former member Blackbeard betrayed and killed the captain

notes: As of this episode, the crew has been expanded with Level 6 Impel Down prisoners. The opening animation was updated to reflect the new crew members.
